props.absolute: Applies **position: absolute** to the content element.
props.closeOnBack: Closes the overlay content when the browser's back button is pressed or `$router.back()` is called, cancelling the original navigation. `persistent` overlays will cancel navigation and animate as if they were clicked outside instead of closing.
props.contained: Limits the size of the component and scrim to its offset parent. Implies `absolute` and `attach`.
props.zIndex: The z-index used for the component
